sentences.en: Allergies are an overreaction of the immune system to certain stimuli.
sentences.cn: 182过敏是免疫系统对某种刺激的过度反应.

sentences.en: And the profession - led pressure leads to cardiovascular disease through chronicle stimuli.
sentences.cn: 职业紧张引起心血管疾病是在长期慢性紧张刺激下发生发展的.

sentences.en: Conduct Interviews via Telephone. Create Stimuli. Scanning at MGH.
sentences.cn: 7通过电话(与被试的朋友及家人)会话. 建立刺激. 在MGH中扫描.

sentences.en: Does the child respond to auditory stimuli ? ie Does he react to the sounds around him?
sentences.cn: 那孩子对声音有反应吗?

sentences.en: Does the child respond to auditory stimuli?
sentences.cn: 那孩子对声音有反应吗？

sentences.en: Eight of these stimuli are natural and constructive. Two are destructive.
sentences.cn: 这十种刺激源中,有八种是天然而有建设性的, 有两种是具破坏力的.

sentences.en: Interest rates could fall soon and be a stimulus to the U.S. economy.
sentences.cn: 利率可能很快会下降，从而刺激美国经济。

sentences.en: It is necessary to curtail or alter normally coexisting stimuli.
sentences.cn: 必需消除或改变正常时并存的刺激.

sentences.en: It is through our nervous system that we adapt ourselves to our environment and to all external stimuli.
sentences.cn: 我们是通过神经系统使自己适应环境及所有外部刺激的。

sentences.en: My sweat glands also respond to emotional stimuli.
sentences.cn: 我的汗腺对情绪刺激也能产生反应.

sentences.en: Other participants were primed with play money or neutral stimuli.
sentences.cn: 其他的受试者则看到游戏纸钞或无暗示意味的刺激.

sentences.en: Tactile and auditory stimuli provoke convulsions with opisthotonos.
sentences.cn: 触觉和听觉的刺激可诱使病牛惊厥和角弓反张.

sentences.en: Tactile and auditory stimuli provoke convulsions with opposthotonis.
sentences.cn: 触觉和听觉的刺激可诱发惊厥和角弓反张.

sentences.en: The stimuli believed to be responsible for secretion are vagal and humoral.
sentences.cn: 迷走神经和体液刺激被认为是引起分泌的原因.
刺激以单耳声的方式呈现出来.

sentences.en: We'll video their faces while they laugh in response to various stimuli.
sentences.cn: 当他们面对不同刺激做出笑的反应时,我们将拍摄他们的向部.

words.tran_cn: 刺激；剌激物；促进因素（stimulus的复数）

trans.tran_cn: 刺激，刺激物，促进因素(stimulus的复数形式)，小尖刺
trans.tran_en: A stimulus is something that encourages activity in people or things
